Î± : Type u_1
G : SimpleGraph Î±
âŠ¢ Iff G.EdgeDisjointTriangles (âˆ€ â¦ƒe : Sym2 Î±â¦„, Not e.IsDiag â†’ (setOf fun s => And (Membership.mem (G.cliqueSet 3) s) (Membership.mem s.sym2 e)).Subsingleton)
decl:
lemma edgeDisjointTriangles_iff_mem_sym2_subsingleton :
    G.EdgeDisjointTriangles â†”
      âˆ€ â¦ƒe : Sym2 Î±â¦„, Â¬ e.IsDiag â†’ {s âˆˆ G.cliqueSet 3 | e âˆˆ (s : Finset Î±).sym2}.Subsingleton := by
  classical
  have (a b) (hab : a â‰  b) : {s âˆˆ (G.cliqueSet 3 : Set (Finset Î±)) | s(a, b) âˆˆ (s : Finset Î±).sym2}
    = {s | G.Adj a b âˆ§ âˆƒ c, G.Adj a c âˆ§ G.Adj b c âˆ§ s = {a, b, c}} := by
    ext s
    simp only [mem_sym2_iff, Sym2.mem_iff, forall_eq_or_imp, forall_eq, Set.sep_and,
      Set.mem_inter_iff, Set.mem_sep_iff, mem_cliqueSet_iff, Set.mem_setOf_eq,
      and_and_and_comm (b := _ âˆˆ _), and_self, is3Clique_iff]
    constructor
    Â· rintro âŸ¨âŸ¨c, d, e, hcd, hce, hde, rflâŸ©, habâŸ©
      simp only [mem_insert, mem_singleton] at hab
      obtain âŸ¨rfl | rfl | rfl, rfl | rfl | rflâŸ© := hab
      any_goals
        simp only [*, adj_comm, true_and, Ne, eq_self_iff_true, not_true] at *
      any_goals
        first
        | exact âŸ¨c, by aesopâŸ©
        | exact âŸ¨d, by aesopâŸ©
        | exact âŸ¨e, by aesopâŸ©
        | simp only [*, adj_comm, true_and, Ne, eq_self_iff_true, not_true] at *
          exact âŸ¨c, by aesopâŸ©
        | simp only [*, adj_comm, true_and, Ne, eq_self_iff_true, not_true] at *
          exact âŸ¨d, by aesopâŸ©
        | simp only [*, adj_comm, true_and, Ne, eq_self_iff_true, not_true] at *
          exact âŸ¨e, by aesopâŸ©
    Â· rintro âŸ¨hab, c, hac, hbc, rflâŸ©
      refine âŸ¨âŸ¨a, b, c, ?_âŸ©, ?_âŸ© <;> simp [*]
  constructor
  Â· rw [Sym2.forall]
    rintro hG a b hab
    simp only [Sym2.isDiag_iff_proj_eq] at hab
    rw [this _ _ (Sym2.mk_isDiag_iff.not.2 hab)]
    rintro _ âŸ¨hab, c, hac, hbc, rflâŸ© _ âŸ¨-, d, had, hbd, rflâŸ©
    refine hG.eq ?_ ?_ (Set.Nontrivial.not_subsingleton âŸ¨a, ?_, b, ?_, hab.neâŸ©) <;>
      simp [is3Clique_triple_iff, *]
  Â· simp only [EdgeDisjointTriangles, is3Clique_iff, Set.Pairwise, mem_cliqueSet_iff, Ne,
      forall_exists_index, and_imp, â† Set.not_nontrivial_iff (s := _ âˆ© _), not_imp_not,
      Set.Nontrivial, Set.mem_inter_iff, mem_coe]
    rintro hG _ a b c hab hac hbc rfl _ d e f hde hdf hef rfl g hgâ‚ hgâ‚‚ h hhâ‚ hhâ‚‚ hgh
    refine hG (Sym2.mk_isDiag_iff.not.2 hgh) âŸ¨âŸ¨a, b, c, ?_âŸ©, by simpa using And.intro hgâ‚ hhâ‚âŸ©
      âŸ¨âŸ¨d, e, f, ?_âŸ©, by simpa using And.intro hgâ‚‚ hhâ‚‚âŸ© <;> simp [is3Clique_triple_iff, *]

name: SimpleGraph.EdgeDisjointTriangles.card_edgeFinset_le
initialProofState:
Î± : Type u_1
G : SimpleGraph Î±
instâœÂ² : DecidableEq Î±
instâœÂ¹ : Fintype Î±
instâœ : DecidableRel G.Adj
hG : G.EdgeDisjointTriangles
âŠ¢ LE.le (HMul.hMul 3 (G.cliqueFinset 3).card) G.edgeFinset.card
decl:
lemma EdgeDisjointTriangles.card_edgeFinset_le (hG : G.EdgeDisjointTriangles) :
    3 * #(G.cliqueFinset 3) â‰¤ #G.edgeFinset := by
  rw [mul_comm, â† mul_one #G.edgeFinset]
  refine card_mul_le_card_mul (fun s e â†¦ e âˆˆ s.sym2) ?_ (fun e he â†¦ ?_)
  Â· simp only [is3Clique_iff, mem_cliqueFinset_iff, mem_sym2_iff, forall_exists_index, and_imp]
    rintro _ a b c hab hac hbc rfl
    have : #{s(a, b), s(a, c), s(b, c)} = 3 := by
      refine card_eq_three.2 âŸ¨_, _, _, ?_, ?_, ?_, rflâŸ© <;> simp [hab.ne, hac.ne, hbc.ne]
    rw [â† this]
    refine card_mono ?_
    simp [insert_subset, *]
  Â· simpa only [card_le_one, mem_bipartiteBelow, and_imp, Set.Subsingleton, Set.mem_setOf_eq,
      mem_cliqueFinset_iff, mem_cliqueSet_iff]
      using hG.mem_sym2_subsingleton (G.not_isDiag_of_mem_edgeSet <| mem_edgeFinset.1 he)

name: SimpleGraph.LocallyLinear.card_edgeFinset
initialProofState:
Î± : Type u_1
G : SimpleGraph Î±
instâœÂ² : DecidableEq Î±
instâœÂ¹ : Fintype Î±
instâœ : DecidableRel G.Adj
hG : G.LocallyLinear
âŠ¢ Eq G.edgeFinset.card (HMul.hMul 3 (G.cliqueFinset 3).card)
decl:
lemma LocallyLinear.card_edgeFinset (hG : G.LocallyLinear) :
    #G.edgeFinset = 3 * #(G.cliqueFinset 3) := by
  refine hG.edgeDisjointTriangles.card_edgeFinset_le.antisymm' ?_
  rw [â† mul_comm, â† mul_one #_]
  refine card_mul_le_card_mul (fun e s â†¦ e âˆˆ s.sym2) ?_ ?_
  Â· simpa [Sym2.forall, Nat.one_le_iff_ne_zero, -Finset.card_eq_zero, Finset.card_ne_zero,
        Finset.Nonempty]
      using hG.2
  simp only [mem_cliqueFinset_iff, is3Clique_iff, forall_exists_index, and_imp]
  rintro _ a b c hab hac hbc rfl
  calc
    _ â‰¤ #{s(a, b), s(a, c), s(b, c)} := card_le_card ?_
    _ â‰¤ 3 := (card_insert_le _ _).trans (succ_le_succ <| (card_insert_le _ _).trans_eq <| by
      rw [card_singleton])
  simp only [subset_iff, Sym2.forall, mem_sym2_iff, le_eq_subset, mem_bipartiteBelow, mem_insert,
    mem_edgeFinset, mem_singleton, and_imp, mem_edgeSet, Sym2.mem_iff, forall_eq_or_imp,
    forall_eq, Quotient.eq, Sym2.rel_iff]
  rintro d e hde (rfl | rfl | rfl) (rfl | rfl | rfl) <;> simp [*] at *

name: SimpleGraph.farFromTriangleFree_of_disjoint_triangles
initialProofState:

âŠ¢ G.FarFromTriangleFree Îµ
decl:
/-- If there are `Îµ * (card Î±)^2` disjoint triangles, then the graph is `Îµ`-far from being
triangle-free. -/
lemma farFromTriangleFree_of_disjoint_triangles (tris : Finset (Finset Î±))
    (htris : tris âŠ† G.cliqueFinset 3)

    (tris_big : Îµ * (card Î± ^ 2 : â„•) â‰¤ #tris) :

initialProofState:

âŠ¢ LT.lt Îµ (Inv.inv 2)
decl:
lemma FarFromTriangleFree.lt_half (hG : G.FarFromTriangleFree Îµ) : Îµ < 2â»Â¹ := by
  classical
  by_contra! hÎµ
  refine lt_irrefl (Îµ * card Î± ^ 2) ?_
  have hÎµâ‚€ : 0 < Îµ := hÎµ.trans_lt' (by norm_num)
  rw [inv_le_iff_one_le_mulâ‚€ (zero_lt_two' ğ•œ)] at hÎµ
  calc
    _ â‰¤ (#G.edgeFinset : ğ•œ) := by
      simpa using hG.le_card_sub_card bot_le (cliqueFree_bot (le_succ _))
    _ â‰¤ Îµ * 2 * #G.edgeFinset := le_mul_of_one_le_left (by positivity) (by assumption)
    _ < Îµ * card Î± ^ 2 := ?_
  rw [mul_assoc, mul_lt_mul_left hÎµâ‚€]
  norm_cast
  calc
    _ â‰¤ 2 * (âŠ¤ : SimpleGraph Î±).edgeFinset.card := by gcongr; exact le_top
    _ < card Î± ^ 2 := ?_
  rw [edgeFinset_top, filter_not, card_sdiff (subset_univ _), card_univ, Sym2.card]
  simp_rw [choose_two_right, Nat.add_sub_cancel, Nat.mul_comm _ (card Î±),
    funext (propext <| Sym2.isDiag_iff_mem_range_diag Â·), univ_filter_mem_range, mul_tsub,
    Nat.mul_div_cancel' (card Î±).even_mul_succ_self.two_dvd]
  rw [card_image_of_injective _ Sym2.diag_injective, card_univ, mul_add_one (Î± := â„•), two_mul, sq,
    add_tsub_add_eq_tsub_right]
  apply tsub_lt_self <;> positivity
